documents.title: boy meets girl - again
text: there 's going to be a second series of transgender comedy boy meets girl , it 's just been announced .
the sitcom , first shown on bbc two last september , tells the story of judy - played by rebecca root - and her younger boyfriend leo - played by harry hepple .

the show was created by writer elliott kerrigan for the trans comedy award , a competition organised by bbc writersroom and the media education group all about trans , to find a script offering a positive portrayal of transgender characters .

two and bbc four controller kim shillinglaw said : `` boy meets girl ventured into territory that classic sitcom has never seen before in britain , but did it with a warmth and an authenticity that bbc two viewers really responded to . ''
the new series is scheduled to air later this year .
root spoke to the bbc about boy meets girl - you can watch the video here .

text: angie bowie has left the celebrity big brother house , with channel 5 saying she had been unwell for several days .
the ex-wife of david bowie had been shown packing a bag on monday night and demanding to follow us producer david gest as he left the programme , again due to medical reasons .

documents.title: cold feet cast warming up
text: the cast of cold feet have been reunited as they prepare to start filming the new series of the comedy drama - 13 years after it was last seen on our screens .
james nesbitt , robert bathurst , hermione norris , john thomson and fay ripley met for a read-through in central london today , with filming for the itv series starting in manchester next month .
thomson , who plays pete , said : `` i 'm delighted to be part of the new series of cold feet .
since it finished almost 13 years ago , the demand for its return from the general public has been overwhelming .
`` it 's fantastic to deliver such a brilliant show to an audience who hold it so dear to their hearts , ''
james bolam , karen david , leanne best and art malik are also joining the cast for the eight-part series but their characters have not yet been revealed .
cold feet originally ran for five series , starting in 1997 .
if you want to remind yourself how it all ended last time , check out our 2003 review of what we described at the time as `` the final ever '' episode here .

documents.title: doctor who music creator remembered
text: delia derbyshire , the uncredited creator of the doctor who 's 1963 theme tune , has been remembered at the third annual day celebrating her achievements .
held in manchester 's arts venue home , delia derbyshire day featured workshops , films and of course her pioneering music .
robin warren went along - for bbc radio 4 's the world tonight - to explore the celebration of her life .
she died in 2001 but , of course , her legacy endures with the millions of fans around the globe .
or perhaps the universe
author: The World Tonight

documents.title: who else has snubbed the oscars ?
text: who indeed ?
well - try katharine hepburn , marlon brando , woody allen and banksy for starters .
and why did they do it ?
various reasons , with hepburn saying : `` as for me , prizes are nothing .
my prize is my work . ''
brando refused his oscar for the godfather , choosing instead to send native american actress and activist sacheen littlefeather to refuse the award on stage .
he wanted to demonstrate his dismay at the entertainment industry 's treatment of native americans .

documents.title: jenner to pen memoir
text: caitlyn jenner is to pen a memoir about her transition .

the book will be written with journalist and author buzz bissinger , who said he was approached about the project a few months after the vanity fair article unveiling caitlyn jenner to the world was published .
he said he told jenner that `` nothing can be left out '' and that he plans to interview `` dozens of other people '' .
it 's her book , but it 's going to be reported out to keep her honest .
she 's been incredibly open , and i think it has the potential to be a really important book .

the memoir - due for release in 2017 - will cover jenner 's life as bruce jenner , including her athletic career , marriages and relationship with her children , as well as her transition into caitlyn .
jenner said :
things have been moving so quickly that it will be nice to slow things down a bit and take the proper time to reflect on this journey .
author: New York Times

documents.title: how do you get to vote for the oscars ?
text: and while we 're on the subject of # oscarssowhite , just who is choosing the nominees ?
in an article , first published in 2012 , the los angeles times found oscar voters are nearly 94 % caucasian and 77 % male .
black members make up about 2 % of the academy , and latino members less than 2 % .
oscar voters have a median age of 62 and people younger than age 50 constitute just 14 % of the membership .
you have to work in the film industry and either be oscar-nominated , or sponsored by two academy members .
not surprisingly you have to have `` 'demonstrated exceptional achievement in the field of theatrical motion

documents.title: radio 6 music festival line-up revealed
text: if music be the food of love then play on , as the line-up for the bbc 6 music festival , taking place over valentine 's weekend , has just been announced .
acts heading to bristol for the event include underworld , foals , suede , laura marling , kurt vile , guy garvey and everything everything .
it had already been announced that primal scream , tricky presents skilled mechanics and roni size & dj krust present full cycle would be among those playing from 12 to 14 february .
in all , there are 50 artists and bands performing , with live music , comedy and conversation on the bill for the festival , being held at venues across the city .
radio 6 music controller bob shennan said : this year 's 6 music festival in bristol will bring a feast of entertainment to a city that has a musical story to tell .

`` the festival will bring together a rich combination of some of the uk 's burgeoning talent including blossoms and rozi plain coupled with 6 music favourites such as underworld and laura marling , fully reflecting 6 music 's exciting and diverse output . ''
there 's more on the 6 music website here .
and you can keep across updates at # 6musicfestival .

documents.title: stephen fry flies from canaries ' nest

the actor and presenter , a lifelong fan of the football club , is going to continue supporting the team as a norwich city ambassador .
he 's going to be replaced as a director by thomas smith - the nephew of tv cook delia smith , joint majority shareholder of the club .
here 's what fry had to say about his decision :
my five years in the role have been an honour and a privilege beyond almost anything i can remember .
i wish i could take credit for ushering the club up from league one to the premiership during that time on the board .
actually , i 'm going to .
it was all me .

documents.title: appoints tv channels and iplayer controller
text: charlotte moore has been appointed as the bbc 's new controller of tv channels and iplayer .
she became controller of bbc one in june 2013 and her newly-created role is part of a wider reorganisation .
moore , who brought the great british bake off to bbc one , said : `` i 'm honoured to lead the bbc 's channel portfolio into the future at such a significant time . ''
she takes up the new position next week .

documents.title: playground games for sting and peter gabriel
text: it 's possible you last played rock , paper , scissors at school - but that 's the game sting and peter gabriel say they 'll be playing each night as they go on tour together across north america and canada .
the musicians will be performing each other 's songs on the rock , paper , scissors tour and joked that they 'll make all their decisions with the help of the playground game .
sting took part in a similar tour with paul simon about a year ago , and said of those gigs : `` we traded songs , we traded musicians , we sang together .
and the take home that people got from that was they loved it when we did things together . ''
the tour starts on 21 june in columbus , ohio .

documents.title: michael keaton given french cultural award
text: american actor michael keaton has been awarded a french honour medal in paris for his contribution to the arts and literature .
the batman and birdman actor was decorated with the officer of the order of arts and letters award by french culture minister fleur pellerin .
she told him : `` i do n't know who you are michael keaton , and that is just fine .

`` but i know you are an actor with extraordinary talent and dexterity , capable of taking on the most diverse of roles , from the most tragic to the most comical , sliding from one to the other without ever running out of breath . ''
keaton said he was honoured to receive the award from such a culturally-rich nation .
and does n't he look proud too ?

documents.title: caine says wife saved him from drink
text: sir michael caine has paid tribute to his wife shakira , saying : `` without her i would have been dead long ago .
i would have probably drunk myself to death . ''
the oscar-winning actor told radio times that he used to drink a bottle of vodka a day and also smoked .
`` meeting shakira calmed me down , '' he said .
`` i was n't unhappy but it was stress .
you know , 'am i going to get another how am i going to do this part ?
how am i going to remember all those lines ?
i 've got to get up at six in the morning and i hope the alarm works ' . ''
sir michael , 82 , famous for films including interstellar , the dark knight rises , the cider house rules and educating rita , added : `` she 's my right-hand man , my confidante .
`` i tell her everything .
i was famous when i met her , but i could n't have got this far without her . ''
he 's a lucky man .

documents.title: new comedy show for peter kay
text: a new peter kay series , taking a look at the 20-year career of the comedian , is coming to bbc one later this year .
peter kay 's comedy shuffle will show highlights from his tv appearances as well as unseen footage and out-takes .
it comes after a christmas special , peter kay : 20 years of funny .
kay said : i was completely overwhelmed by the response to 20 years of funny , and i feel honoured that the bbc would like to take a further look back at my career so far .
`` i 'm also delighted to still be working after 20 years at a job i still love . ''

documents.title: american pie singer don mclean arrested
text: american pie singer don mclean was arrested in the us on monday on a charge of domestic violence assault .
the 70-year-old was released from knox county jail after posting $ 10,000 ( £ 7,007 ) bail .
mclean , who lives in camden , maine , had a 1971 hit with american pie , about the deaths of buddy holly , ritchie valens and the big bopper in a plane crash .
he 'll be appearing in court next month .

documents.title: mary berry turned down strictly come dancing

but now it turns out that national treasure mary berry has turned down the chance to don glitzy ballroom dresses on strictly come dancing .
explaining to the radio times why she said no to the bbc one show , she said : `` my husband and children would kill me .
`` i have two left feet and would make a terrible fool of myself . ''
we 're sure that would n't have been the case mary .
you 'd have whipped the ballroom into a frenzy , beaten off the competition and seen a steady rise in your dancing abilities - no wooden spoon for you .

documents.title: race to get hands on blackstar vinyl
text: vinyl versions of blackstar , the album david bowie released days before his death , are selling for more than 10 times their original price .
some copies are being sold for more than £ 400 as fans rush to get their hands on a copy .
a clear vinyl edition of the album , pressed with a die-cut cover , was released , with only 5,000 copies pressed .
they originally sold for £ 30 but are now fetching more than £ 400 on ebay .
black vinyl copies have sold out , but sony says it 's going to release more .
they were initially on sale for about £ 21 but many copies are now being sold for more than £ 100 .
a spokesman for music magazine record collector said : `` a major artist 's vinyl going through the roof when they have died is a well-known phenomenon in collector 's circles .
`` dealers multiply the price of records that were often worth very little before the act in question died , and grieving fans see it as an act of faith to buy them . ''

documents.title: may voices support for evans ' top gear
text: former top gear presenter james may has been vocal in his support for new host chris evans , saying the bbc has been `` harsh '' on him by celebrating the show 's history .
`` i was surprised they showed lots of top gear compilations over christmas , '' he told radio times .
`` just as he 's trying to launch his version of the programme , the bbc is saying : 'look how brilliant it was before ' ``
may is joining the show 's former hosts jeremy clarkson and richard hammond for their new amazon prime motoring show , which will be top gear 's direct rival .
but there 's no animosity between them and evans .
`` i 'd like to see chris 's top gear do well , '' may said .
`` it 's a ballsy call to continue it .
i would n't want to be the one presenting it when we 'd just finished , but there must be a way of reinventing it .
`` we always said it would survive beyond us . ''
he also poured cold water on suggestions in the press that top gear was floundering and may not be ready in time .
`` i think the stories about chris 's version being in trouble might be an elaborate hoax , before it explodes onto our screens in brilliance , '' he said .
clarkson was dropped by the bbc after what it called a `` fracas '' with a producer , and his co-presenters signed up to present a new show with him on amazon 's streaming video service .
